metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28023 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Out-of-bounds Read. smtp_setup_msg may disclose sensitive information from process memory to an unauthenticated SMTP client.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28023` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
exim4-base - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
exim4-config - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
exim4-daemon-light - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
eximon4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> trusty/xenial ESM not-affected code not present

criterions.comment: exim4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8').
